backend/main.mo: Actor canister with channel categories, user profiles, access control, and storage; defines types and queries/mutations for channels, profiles, and stats.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old channel data to the expanded category set by mapping legacy categories to new ones.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, and tests for category expansion and UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing all major frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with light/dark theme variables and base resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the router, routes, and theme provider for all pages in the app.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Displays user name and Bacon Cash balance with a button to purchase more.
Wrapper enforcing admin access, showing loaders or denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultGateD: Modal asking for adult-content age confirmation with confirm and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultRoute: Guards adult routes by checking consent and showing the adult gate dialog when required.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with an icon and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter a display name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Conditionally renders children based on authentication, admin status, and channel ownership.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Clickable brand logo that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/components/branding/Categor: Displays a category-specific icon based on a mapped image list.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Large hero banner with background image and marketing text.
frontend/src/components/channels/Channel: Card showing a channel’s thumbnail, title, category badge, and description, linking to the stream page.
Form dialog for creating or editing channels with fields, validation, and thumbnail upload.
Displays a grid of channel cards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/channels/Thumbna: Handles thumbnail image selection, upload progress, previewing, and removal.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, auth controls, and optional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Top navigation bar for category links, Bacon Ops, and Creator Studio access when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/player/StreamEmb: Embeds a video stream by detecting iframe, YouTube, or Twitch URLs and renders fallback alerts if missing.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Provides a share button using the Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/ai.ts: Implements simple enemy AI behaviors including stationary and basic patrol direction setup.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/consta: Defines gameplay constants for player, enemy, projectile stats, and scoring.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameLo: Runs the main game loop, updating state, processing input, and rendering each frame.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameSt: Initializes the game state with player and enemy setup based on mode and canvas size.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/render: Renders the player, enemies, and projectiles onto the canvas with image assets and basic graphics.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/system: Contains core gameplay systems for movement, aiming, projectiles, enemy behavior, collision detection, and scoring.
Defines shared TypeScript interfaces for game entities, state, input, and modes.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useDesk: Provides keyboard and mouse input handling for desktop gameplay, updating movement and firing states.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useTouc: Provides touch-control input state and callbacks for movement, aiming, and firing, with disabled mode returning defaults.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/Virtual: Implements mobile touch controls including a joystick and fire button using touch events.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/BaconOpsMa: Renders the main menu with selectable game modes, start button, and user stats panel.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/Hud.tsx: Displays in‑game HUD showing health, score, and round info with icons and a dynamic health bar.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/RoundOverl: Shows victory/defeat overlay with final score and buttons to restart or return to menu.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/StatsPanel: Shows login prompt or authenticated user's best score using Internet Identity and query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdultGate.ts: Manages session‑stored adult‑consent state with functions to grant or revoke it.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Fetches caller user role and admin status using actor-based queries gated by identity readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating channels and user profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light and dark modes, and custom Bacon Ops UI classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBaconCashRequest: Displays all Bacon Cash purchase requests for admins and provides controls to fulfill them.
frontend/src/pages/BaconOpsArenaPage.tsx: Runs the Bacon Ops Arena game, handling canvas setup, input, game loop, and best score updates.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHomePage.tsx: Shows the home browsing page with categories and recently added channels.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBaconCashPage.tsx: Allows users to request Bacon Cash purchases and view the status of their past requests.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays channels filtered by category, with adult-category protection when needed.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information and a mailto link for reaching the site owner.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Creator dashboard for listing, creating, editing, deleting channels with clipboard copy helpers and identity gating.
frontend/src/pages/StreamDetailPage.tsx: Stream detail page that loads a channel, embeds the stream, shows metadata, and provides edit/delete options for authorized users.
frontend/src/utils/category.ts: Defines category constants, labels, and helper functions for retrieving category metadata and display names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, state versioning, architecture notes, and image requirements.
